extendedInfo.description: WinZip, the world's #1 zip utility, makes it easy to view, open and save zip files on your Android device, whether they're attached to an incoming email, downloaded from a web page or opened from an SD memory card.WinZip for Android Top Features- Receive a zip file and view supported image, text and web files directly within the WinZip app. Easily open other popular file formats with 3rd party app integration.- Open encrypted Zip files (including AES128 and AES256) to review sensitive material safely while on the go.- Copy unzipped content to the clipboard to paste into an email or another application. Save the last extracted zip file to access at later time.- Automatically unzip and install Android apps (.apk files) delivered as .zip files from Google Play or the Amazon Appstore.  File Support and 3rd Party IntegrationWinZip for Android lets you view:- Photos and images (.jpg, .jpeg, .png, .bmp, .gif) - Text files (.rtf, .csv, .txt, .ini, .inf, .bat, .js, .log, .xml,.css, .java, .cs, .h, .m,.cpp,.c,.sql,. properties) - Web files (htm, .html,.jsp,.asp) WinZip for Android lets you open other popular file types in 3rd party apps:- Word documents (.doc, .docx) - Excel spreadsheets (.xls, .xlsx) - PowerPoint presentations (.ppt, .pptx) - PDF files (.pdf) WinZip for Android builds on the success of WinZip for iOS, introduced earlier this year and already downloaded by more than a million people. WinZip tools are now available on all of the industryâs most popular platforms â Windows, Mac, iOS and Android.Compatible with Android operating systems 2.1 (Eclair), 2.2 (Froyo), 2.3 (Gingerbread), 3.x (Honeycomb) and 4.x (Ice Cream Sandwich), WinZip for Android is available now as a free English app.

reviews.comment: I expected it to do what it said....but was faced with \'Unsupported compression format\'. If a zip opening app cant open a zip file, forget it. Uninstaled.
reviews.author: Will Sturgeon

reviews.title: Great app for opening zip files.
reviews.comment: I loved winzip since the day I used the computer at the very first time. And I loved this app. Really great app to open zip files. But I noticed that it can\'t open rar files. But winzip for pc software can. I wish it\'d be the same. All in all, it\'s a great app if you\'re looking for an app to open only zip files.
reviews.author: Violet Lin

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: No progress bar while creating a zip file.. And I think Zip process paused when screen off.

reviews.title: You had one job...
reviews.comment: I wanted to uncompress a 600Mb file, selected a target folder and... No progress bar, the process seems to sleep when the phone screen goes off. Tired of waiting I interrupted the process (no cancel button, does not care about \"back\") and ended up with a bunch of files named as archivenamefilename.ext. Yeah, not in a subfolder.
